title: Darrell Issa
deleted: Issa is opposed to democratic California Govenor Newsom's sending out mail in ballots during the COVID-19 pandemic. Darrell Issa published OpEd: “Why Gov. Newsom’s order to mail November ballots to all Californians is wrong” on June 4, 2020.<ref>{{cite web |last1=Issa |first1=Darrell |title=Why mail ballots wrong |url=https://www.sandiegouniontribune.com/opinion/story/2020-06-04/issa-voting-by-mail-2020-commentary |website=San Diego Union-Tribune |publisher=San Diego Union-Tribune |accessdate=24 October 2020}}</ref>
